solution_line_template: Misty's favorite number is {times_smaller} times smaller than Glory's, meaning her favorite number is {glory_number} / {times_smaller} = <<{glory_number}/{times_smaller}={misty_number}>>{misty_number}
The sum of their favorite numbers is {misty_number} + {glory_number} = <<{misty_number}+{glory_number}={sum_of_numbers}>>{sum_of_numbers}
